responses.response:

* "That" -> "At" (correct use of the definite article "at" instead of the indefinite article "that")

* Added a comma after "met" (correct punctuation after the verb "met")
* Added a comma after "the" (correct punctuation after the noun "world")
* Added a period at the end of the sentence (correct punctuation after the verb "met")
